title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2001 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2005, slightly increasing from 2005 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 427.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 123.0 was recorded at Year 2001
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2001 to 2011.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2018.
